backend/main.mo: Defines data types and user data storage with access-controlled profile and user-specific state management functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides brief summaries of key frontend files, explaining their roles and recent UI or feature changes.
frontend/DRAFT_PREVIEW.md: Guide explaining how to run a local draft preview build without deployment.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color variables, theming, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template that loads the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and page structure including public and protected sections.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrototypeSi: Dismissible dialog informing users the prototype is in feedback mode, with a close button.
frontend/src/components/brand/ClickableW: Clickable wordmark button that navigates to the home page using the router.
frontend/src/components/brand/Wordmark.t: Displays the PulseBrief wordmark image with configurable sizing.
frontend/src/components/brief/YesterdayV: Widget comparing today's and yesterday's brief scores with up/down/flat indicators.
frontend/src/components/charts/ChartPlac: Placeholder chart component showing a titled card with a mock visualization indicator.
frontend/src/components/common/DemoState: Displays a small inline badge indicating sample or preview state.
frontend/src/components/common/Prototype: Renders a top notice bar stating the product is an experimental prototype and requests feedback.
frontend/src/components/common/ScorePill: Shows a colored pill displaying a score relative to a max value, with size variants.
frontend/src/components/common/StandardS: Displays a labeled score with tooltip explanation, ensuring the explanation is one sentence.
frontend/src/components/compliance/Discl: Footer bar showing disclaimers, preview notice, and a caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/components/feedback/GiveFee: Empty placeholder file for a feedback dialog component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Main navigation header with route buttons and a feedback link opening an external form.
Wraps the app layout with nav, notice bar, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Protected: Guards prototype pages by redirecting users without a session and optionally showing a sign‑in dialog.
frontend/src/components/marketPulse/mark: Parses raw market pulse text into structured sections and validates format.
frontend/src/components/marketPulse/Mark: Renders a parsed market pulse update with sections like breaking, developing, context, and impact.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AssetE: Form for adding portfolio assets with validation and sign‑in requirement.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/FreeAs: Manages free‑tier asset input with limits, add/remove actions, and validation.
frontend/src/components/states/EmptyStat: Generic empty state component with icon, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSt: Skeleton loading layout showing placeholder cards and text.
frontend/src/config/waitlist.ts: Exports early access waitlist URL from environment or default.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity change and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoCreateMarketPu: Periodically checks for the latest Market Pulse update and auto-generates a new one when enough time has passed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoCreateTodaysBr: Auto-creates today's daily brief for signed-in users if it doesn't already exist, using yesterday's brief for context.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via a React context using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequirePrototypeSi: Checks prototype session state and determines whether sign-in is required for certain actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layers with custom light/dark theme variables including Market Pulse styling tokens.
frontend/src/lib/dailyBriefGenerator.ts: Generates deterministic daily brief content based on a date-derived seed and optional previous-day data.
frontend/src/lib/freePortfolioAnalysis.t: Analyzes a mock portfolio to compute a health score and produce basic risk and opportunity messages.
Provides static demo Market Pulse updates for use when the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/lib/marketPulseGenerator.ts: Provides deterministic, seed-based generation of market pulse text using predefined templates for four sections.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind and clsx class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AlertsRulesPage.tsx: Displays predefined alert rules with toggle controls tied to alert query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with navigation to brief and portfolio sections.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryHistoryPage.ts: Shows library access states depending on sign-in and Pro entitlement, with loading and locked views.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Handles portfolio editing and analysis with different flows for signed-out, free, and Pro users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile settings page allowing users to update timezone and topic preferences, with persistence through profile queries.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchModePage.tsx: Interactive research interface that lets users select topics, generates placeholder research entries, and saves items.
frontend/src/pages/RootPage.tsx: Root entry page that redirects signed‑in users to the brief page and otherwise shows the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysBriefPage.tsx: Daily market pulse page that fetches or generates market updates with retry logic and supports demo mode.
frontend/src/queries/alertsQueries.ts: React‑query hooks to list, create, toggle, and ensure predefined alert rules using the actor backend.
frontend/src/queries/briefQueries.ts: Query hooks for listing briefs, fetching today's brief, and creating new daily briefs with cache invalidation.
Hook to check Pro entitlement status by querying the actor and exposing loading and fetched state.
frontend/src/queries/libraryQueries.ts: Queries for fetching briefs, research items, and portfolio snapshots for the library section.
Hooks to fetch sorted market pulse updates and create new updates with automatic cache refresh.
frontend/src/queries/portfolioQueries.ts: Query and mutation hooks for portfolio snapshots, adding assets, and creating new snapshots.
frontend/src/queries/profileQueries.ts: Hooks to load and update a user profile based on email, with cache invalidation on update.
frontend/src/queries/researchQueries.ts: Hooks to list research items and create or save research entries via actor mutations.
frontend/src/state/usePrototypeSession.t: Defines a persisted Zustand store for tracking an email value with setters and a clear function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash params, sync them with sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theming, colors, fonts, shadows, and animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current requirements, feature states, and notes for the Feedback Mode UI with a single feedback CTA and no pricing copy.
